answers.answer: Thank you for sharing your experience, I hope your son is feeling better.Oral Isotretinoin is the most effective acne treatment available but has numerous potential side effects and should only be used when all other treatments have resulted in failure or relapse.
I unfortunately found this out the hard way -- it was so not worth it !!!  Did you have any side effects from the drug

question: Please Read:My son started Clavaris (generic accutane) in September 09 - By mid-october her was experiencing some GI upset - which got progressively worse - the derm told us to take an antacid and OTC pepcid - by our December appt he was worse.  I took him to the pediatrician and he was diagnosed with a huge liver cyst - (never had an abnormal blood reading) - surgically removed the cyst and a month later was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes.  Anyone out there have a similiar experience...  Please BEWARE -- they so downplay the side effects - but there are so many!!!  The only thing they ever questioned us about was his 'mood'
title: Accutane and Diabetes
